message.body: ï¿¼
Idk what that is when did you see her
Besides she invited you two not me so whatever it is just do it and have fun
I saw her and Kyle walking to class. And it's where you jump into a cold body of water. And lovey...
She didn't know you were here and she says you should come. Sound horrible to you?
Umm
Do whatever you want Johnny have fun
Wtf.
I HAVE NO IDEA WHAT THIS IS
What body of water, where, when
Idk?! It's just an idea...
Wtf Johnny you can't be like "wanna jump into freezing water with me?" Cuz chances are I'll say yes but god dammit give me some information at least
Ideas always have extra info if you want me to seriously think about something you need to tell me what it is.
I don't have any info to give love. This weekend is all I know, and it'd consist of jumping into some cold water with people and then jumping out. Idk...
Just come home okay? And buy condoms. Sure ill do it.
Okay I'm out of here at 1245 and okay. And yeah idk If youd want or not. I've never really done it.
K I'll see you then.

I had more bad dreams about my favorite person and all I can think of is wow she wouldn't be a bitch to Johnny. She would just say yes without even knowing what it is. So fuck me, I hate my life. I'll see you then
Lovey! No truthfully I'm not fully convinced hah sounds cold and would rather go explore with you maybe heh. No more bad dreams! You can't sleep at night cuz you sleep in alot btw
I woke up when you woke up I didn't go back to sleep. And I knowww but then I'm tired all day so this sucks
Anyway I'll see you soon
Buy condoms
And milk
Okay meh you make me go alone
Come back I'm hungry
Like starving
Babyyyyy
Meowwww
Be there in five
Yayyyy
Baby the only other real donuts are in Wallingford can I just have some raspberry? I don't feel good and I just wanna watch greys
Unless I should wait for you
I can pick you some up dear. How many shud I get?
3 raspberry
Should I wait for you to watch greys
Okie
Go ahead heh
Okay i wuv you
Love you too hehe
Thank you Johnny so much
